By Kurasu Soratobu on Thursday, April 18, 2002 - 10:54 am:

I would have thought that Snowy (Pixie/Jill) could get all the same techs as a normal pixie. However, interestingly enough, I'm having some problems. See, my Snowy (bred, by the way) can't get Flame. She doesn't presently have Flame, and yet no matter when I go to the Power errantry, it says 'May Be Hard'. Now, I _know_ that Flame isn't locked, nor is it an evil tech (although Gigaflame is). So, is this a Snowy problem? Or have I discovered an interesting glitch with pixie-breeding?
